metadata.dc:author: Ruiz Sánchez, C
Miquel Abbad, C
Beltrán Ramón, J
metadata.dc:description: Author does a revision, bring up-to-date, and special mention of physiopathology, clinics and treatment of "diabetic foot". The three basic types: microangiopathy, neurological and infectious; symptomatology and medical or surgical treatment, are exposed, pointing at the possibility of preserving treatment in these patients.
metadata.dc:title: Fisiopatología, clínica y tratamiento del pie diabético.
[Physiopathology, clinical aspects and treatment of the diabetic foot].
